name: Knuspernikus
description:
Our little christmas elf Knuspernikus loves sweets, hot chocolate and everyting about christmas.
But someone decorated the trees with all the sweets! Would you be so kind and help him to eat as much as his little tummy can carry?

Controls:
← jump on the left platform
→ jump on the right platform
←+→ jump on the middle platform

M toggle music and sounds
ESC exit the game(desktop only)
